control.label: Press 'X' to stop
control.visible: !IsEmpty(ListItem.Trailer) + Skin.HasSetting(multiplexbigtrailer) + Player.HasVideo + Control.IsVisible(52) + !Control.HasFocus(197) + [Control.IsVisible(109) | Control.HasFocus(110) | Skin.HasSetting(multiplexinfoon) | [ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus() + Skin.HasSetting(multiplexinfotrigger)]]

Control.IsVisible(52) + ![stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,1) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,2) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,3) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,4) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,5) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,6) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,7) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,8)]

Control.IsVisible(52) + ![stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,1) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,2) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,3) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,4) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,5) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,6) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,7) | stringcompare(Container(52).NumItems,8)]
